translations: 壮丽，壮观；美景，让人印象深刻的事物（splendors）

sentences.sentence: I will enjoy to the full all my splendor!
sentences.translation: 我要尽情享受我所有的辉煌！

sentences.sentence: The splendor of it was beyond all imagination!
sentences.translation: 它的辉煌是超乎想象的！

sentences.sentence: The author tried to depict the splendor of the sunset.
sentences.translation: 作家试图摹写落日的光彩。
